attributes.action: Councils within the UK to end twinning with Russian cities and regions
attributes.additional_details: The general public need a way to show their support for the Ukrainian people against the aggressive and unprovoked invasion of Ukraine by Russia. Most people have no way to show their support for Ukraine, but this action will show their support whilst rebuking Russian towns and cities over their governments unjustified invasion of Ukraine. This needs to be a national action throughout the UK.
attributes.background: With the unjustified and unprovoked invasion of Ukraine by Russia, the government to order all cities within the UK that are twinned with cities or regions of Russia to end those ties and urgently remove any Russian names and then rename them using Ukrainian names.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual areas.
